name: Sound of Shapes
description:
Sound of shapes Music festival is an Environment created to let the player experience the excitement of an outdoor music festival in the comfort of your home. Letting the player experience being part of the electric energy pulsating crowds atmosphere, making new memories, seeing artist perform live, connecting to your to crowd through music and enjoying music in an outdoor environment.

The player embarks on an adventure thought the environment. Exploring the different areas that offer different types entertainment. There are 3 different Music stages that all have a unique shape  and colours. The different shaped stage are what inspired the name of the environment. The other two place the user can explore are the food and drinks area and the toilet area.

This environment creates the atmosphere of an outdoor summer event which is done using ambient sounds,lighting, a summer colour pallet and environmental animation.The environmental animation are the wind blowing in the tree that bring life to the tree. The sound effects are wind blowing throw the tree and the sound of bird chirping when you approach certain trees. The colour used are mostly warm colours to create a summer atmosphere. The lighting used is a warm yellow light that has soft shadows that are usually found in summer time.

The music for the three different stages are selected from three most popular dance music genres EDM, Trap and Deep house.The music is Hand selected the best royalty free music. Each stage play 4 different songs for user entertainment. The player can join in the crowd mosh pits and jump with fellow crow members to have a more real festival experience.

The player has the ability to interact with the food, drink and the stages. The player can use the e key to pick up and start eating or drinking, food and drinks. The player can also play and pause the music by entering and leaving the music stage so that they never miss a moment of the live music entertainment.
